references: Related: CF 273503, CF 273776, CF 274104. Amending: Ord 84905, Ord 97178.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating the design, construction, alteration, operation and maintenance of elevators, escalators, dumbwaiters, moving walks and manlifts, amending Sections 1, 3, 4 and 5 of Ordinance 84905 and adding a new Section 4A thereto.
